resources:
OneURL A URL-Shortener and QR code generator with OneUI-Design. About OneURL
@string/app_name @string/app_description oneurl@leonard-lemke.com https://www.leonard-lemke.com/apps/oneurl/privacy-policy The use of OneURL for URL shortening is subject to the terms of use and privacy policy of the respective services provided by third parties.

It is not permitted to use this app contrary to morality or the laws in force. 

You also agree that you will not use this app for any purposes prohibited by United States law, including, without limitation, the development, design, manufacture, or production of missile, chemical or biological weapons. 
However, this restriction will not apply in the event of the occurrence (certified by the United States Centers for Disease Control or successor body) of a widespread viral infection transmitted via bites or contact with bodily fluids that causes human corpses to reanimate and seek to consume living human flesh, blood, brain or nerve tissue and is likely to result in the fall of organized civilization. 

A special consideration, which may include monetary compensation, will be provided to a limited number of users who read this section of the Terms and Services and contact me at writing-an-email-to-this-address-will-cost-you-10-euro@leonard-lemke.com. This offer may be withdrawn at any time without any notice. 

Additional questions will be answered at this-email-is-way-too-long-and-hopefully-you-cannot-copy-paste@leonard-lemke.com.
OneURL respects your privacy and does not store any personal information. For more information, please refer to our Privacy Policy. 
The use of OneURL to shorten URLs is subject to the terms of use of the respective services provided by third-party providers. Please consult the terms and conditions of each service provider to learn more about their policies and restrictions.

Costs and Rate Limits:
The providers available in the app are free of charge. Some providers therefore have rate limits. Exceeding the rate limit can lead to temporary or permanent blocking of your IP address with a provider. Please note that this blocking is managed by the service providers themselves.
Normally, these limits should not be reached as a normal user. We recommend to respect the rate limits of the service providers and not to exceed them intentionally to ensure a seamless usage.
Provider info Select provider Group Hint before redirecting Before redirecting, this provider displays a hint that informs the user about the destination URL. This provider has been designed to be as data efficient as possible. It is operated from Germany and complies with the applicable privacy regulations in Germany and Europe. Emoji This URL shortener uses emojis to create personalized and easy-to-remember links. When specifying an alias, only emojis are allowed. The individual aliases can have a length between %1$d and %2$d characters and may only consist of the characters "%3$s". This feature allows users to create personalized and easy-to-remember aliases for their links. Analytics This provider offers the possibility to use analytics to get insights into the performance of the shortened links. The provider da.gd offers the possibility to use analytics to get insights into the performance of the shortened links. With da.gd, the links must have been accessed at least once within the last 60 days, otherwise an error will be displayed (404). In addition to the normal URL shortener, owo.vc also offers other URL shorteners. These are intended for entertainment purposes and should be used respectfully, responsibly and with caution. The URL shortener "owo.vc (zws)" uses Zero-Width Spaces in the generated links. These spaces are invisible, which is why all links appear the same ("owo.vc/"). When copying and pasting in certain apps, these spaces may be removed. In such cases, the standard owo.vc page will open instead of the intended destination URL. Therefore, use this service with caution. The URL shortener "owo.vc (sketchy)" generates suspicious-looking URLs containing keywords like "bank-login", "password", "hidden", "grab" or "account" along with popular website names. The URL shortener "owo.vc (gay)" employs offensive and sexist language and may represent inappropriate or offensive content. Be aware that the generated links may contain sexist terms and could be considered offensive and disrespectful by others. Use this service with respect and responsibility. The URL shortener "zws.im" uses Zero-Width Spaces in the generated links. These spaces are invisible, which is why all links appear the same ("zws.im/"). When copying and pasting in certain apps, these spaces may be removed. In such cases, the standard zws.im page will open instead of the intended destination URL. Therefore, use this service with caution. This URL shortener utilizes multiple domains for the same service, meaning it may generate short URLs with different domain names (e.g., tinyurl.com). Therefore, use this service with caution. The URL shortener shorturl.at does not offer an API and is therefore not as reliable as other providers in this app. In addition, links with less than one click per month are deactivated. Therefore, use this service with caution.
Automatic copying Automatically copy the shortened URL to the clipboard
Beautiful design. Free No ads No subscriptions, no in-app purchases, no costs at all. No annoying ads.
Add url Provider Custom alias Custom alias (Optional) e.g.: xyz123 Description (Optional) e.g.: My website To URL URL added Checking for duplicates… Checking internet connection… Checking the URL for blacklisting, malware, phishing, spam or abuse… Generating URL…
URL "Description: " "Title: " "Created: " "Visits: " Shorten URL (OneURL) Copy shortened URL Long press URLs or QR codes to copy them to the clipboard. No URLs No search results No favorite URLs
No internet connection available… Please check your internet connection and try again. URL not found It seems that there is a problem with v.gd/is.gd. Please choose another provider. Empty URL. URL already shortened This URL has already been shortened with a different alias. Please try shortening a different URL or leave the alias unspecified. Alias already exists. Try another one or leave it empty to generate a random one. Alias too short (min. %1$d characters). Alias too long (max. %1$d characters). Invalid URL. Invalid alias. Invalid alias (allowed characters: %1$s). Invalid URL or alias. This URL is blacklisted. It may have been used abusively in the past, or it may link to another URL redirection service. If you continue trying to shorten blacklisted URLs, you may be blocked from using this service. Rate limit exceeded, use another provider or wait for at least 5 minutes, before making the next request. Otherwise, you may be blocked from using this service. Service unavailable Service currently unavailable. Please try again later or use another provider. Domain not allowed. Internal server error. The service of this provider is offline. Please use another provider.
This URL is blacklisted on: %1$s.
%2$s
If you continue trying to shorten blacklisted URLs, you may be blocked from using this App. It may have been used abusively in the past, or it may link to another URL redirection service. It is a known spammer domain. It is a known phishing domain. It is a known botnet C&C domain. It is a known compromised website used for spammer hosting. It is a known compromised website used for malware distribution. It is a known compromised website used for phishing hosting. It is a known compromised website used for botnet C&C hosting. It is a known abused redirector or URL shortener.
